data.title: Happy birthday to visionary architect Frank Lloyd Wright, born on this day in 1867! 🎂 Here are some fun facts about Wright you might not...
data.meta_description:
11K likes, 80 comments - guggenheim on June 8, 2024: "Happy birthday to visionary architect Frank Lloyd Wright, born on this day in 1867! 🎂 Here are some fun facts about Wright you might not have known:

🌀His real middle name was Lincoln. He later changed it to Lloyd, adopting his mother’s maiden name as a way to honor her.

🌀He never graduated high school and attended one semester of college in engineering at the University of Wisconsin before working for Chicago architect John Selby.

🌀He disliked NYC, criticizing its skyscrapers. He agreed to design the Guggenheim only if it bordered nature, hence its location next to Central Park.

🌀He initially named the Guggenheim “Archeseum,” his term for “Architecture Museum.” This name appears on his construction drawings, specifications, and correspondence until 1956.
___
📷 : Frank Lloyd Wright on balcony of Guggenheim, 1959. Photo by William Short; Wright poses next to a model of the museum, 1953. Photo by Pedro E. Guerrero; Wright at the Guggenheim, 1959. Photo by William Short. #FrankLloydWright".
